file_content.text: Wonder if I can get transferred off this ice cube....
I destroyed the comm station. No chance of the Imperials taking it now.
Ha! That'll teach 'em!
Appreciate the help. I'd shake your hand if I could still feel my fingers.
Don't skimp on the explosives. I want to feel the heat from here.
Brrr! How's anyone supposed to think in this weather?
Those rotten Imps, driving me out of my own comm station. I'll kill 'em! Kill 'em and bury 'em!
No, no, I'll burn the remains. Yeah, a nice, big fire. Warm me right up.
Don't let your anger get the better of you.
Calm down.
Yeah, maybe I should cool down. Oh, right, I'm on Hoth.
There is warmth in serenity. Close your eyes and turn your mind inward.
There are other ways.
And risk freezing my eyelids shut? No thanks.
My kind of bonfire. Maybe I'll join you.
I like the way you think.
You bring the Imps; I'll bring the flammables.
For a few creds, I could set you up with a couple heat packs.
I could sell you a blanket.
You don't think I've already got some? It's this planet. Chills you to the core.
Everything okay?
Be a lot better once I get my hands on the chump who assigned me here.
What has the Empire done this time?
Back up.
Put me out in the cold, that's what!
That comm station the Imperials captured--we'd been using it to track their movements. Now it's in their hands, and they're returning the favor.
It'll take weeks of back-and-forth fighting to retake that station. I say we blow the place up and call it a day.
That seems a bit extreme.
Beats letting it fall into enemy hands.
Sounds like a plan!
Here are the charges you'll need. Should level those jammers no problem.
In fact, take extra. Let's really get those flames roaring.
No way. [Refuse quest]
It's a free pass to blow up Republic property! What more do you want?
Can't talk. Too cold.
The explosions were music to my ears. That'll teach those White Maw!
The comm channels are finally clear. Our troops are getting organized. It's about time.
Blasted White Maw, stealing our signal jammers... I'll kill 'em! Kill 'em and bury 'em in the ice!
You bring the pirates; I'll bring the flammables.
I'll be a whole lot better when every pirate piece of filth on this planet gets what's coming to him.
What happened to you?
I was holed-up nice and warm at Aurek Base. I'd done my part here. But those pirates ruined everything!
When White Maw invaded, the first thing they did was steal our signal jammers and turn them against us. We can't organize our forces.
We don't have the troops to retake all those jammers. We'll just have to blow them sky-high and call it even.
Beats letting the pirates jam our comm frequencies--or worse, letting the Imps take our jammers from the White Maw!
A necessary evil, I suppose.
Unless you've got a spare brigade to retrieve our jammers, torching them is our best bet.
